main event: On 22 July 1950, an unidentified object was sighted over Ladd Air Force Base, Alaska, described as red with two white dots underneath while descending slowly.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 20 minutes from gun positions,The object was three feet in diameter and exhibited unique movement patterns with the white dots appearing to act as reflectors,The weather conditions were CAVU with no known aircraft in the vicinity during the sighting,Observers included trained military personnel considered reliable in their testimony,The conclusion of the sighting suggested it might be a meteorological balloon but identification was not definitively established.
witness description: trained military personnel from the United States Armed Forces
